website_summaries.verdict: Although this affordable adult coloring book is on the smaller side, each page spotlights a brilliantly drawn hummingbird alongside plants, insects, and flowers, so you can finally color your dream garden.
pros: 25 coloring pages of hummingbirds and flowers
Each page sports a single illustration per page to prevent color-bleeding
Suitable for markers, pencils, water colors, etc
cons: While the pages aren’t perforated, it is easy to safely tear out colored pages for framing

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty, but Low-Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are SO pretty, but the paper is the thinnest paper I've ever colored on in any grownup coloring book. My Tombow markers bled through very easily onto the next page.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I havent started coloring this book yet but the pictures are great. I was searching for coloring books landed across this one it caught my eye right off. I had to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy SIII

customer_reviews.title: Stress reliever.
customer_reviews.text: Great stress relief for an art teacher in Covid times. I put in 12-14 hour days. All of my creative thinking right now goes into my lesson plans and the examples I have to come up with. I’m spent. With this - I pick a page - turn on Netflix - grab a pretty color and stay in the lines! No thinking required. Zen.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbirds Galore!
customer_reviews.text: As I love hummingbirds, I purchased this book and was amazed at the truly gorgeous pages held within. I would recommend this coloring book to anyone who loves hummingbirds!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely hummingbirds!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pics in this book...I do love a challenge though so I will only be doing a couple of them. I bought this book way back in January 2020 and i have quite a few on coloring book cafes books. I love them all so it's hard to pick which one I want to do next. Lol
customer_reviews.author: alice wilfert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Humming birds & friends!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures! I will enjoy coloring all the projects in this book!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Wild ☀️

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures in this book
customer_reviews.text: Love the beautiful pics each page has. Recieved it quickly and was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cosello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister and she thought it beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful book if you like Hummingbird's
customer_reviews.text: My mother and sister are Fan's of hummingbirds, so I purchased this book to create gift ideas with the pictures after I color them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Dame

customer_reviews.title: Coloring Books for Adults
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is very detailed and very nice My Mom loved it! I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 75 year old mother who is a big fan of the Johanna Basford books but has colored ALL of them. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice pictures. Birds starting to return so I will be pulling it out again
customer_reviews.author: RoxieRoxenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great value and artwork
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly enjoy coloring these fine pages of lovely artwork. I'll be buying more books.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anne Hess

customer_reviews.title: Very good coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Coloring book cafe puts outs very good books enjoyed them very much
customer_reviews.author: connie pettey

customer_reviews.title: Thin paper
customer_reviews.text: You said its also for watercolors. that's a big lie, it bleeds right through
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Quaily
customer_reviews.text: The graphics and detail is mediocre. I was upset because it is nothing as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brandylee Cox

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE HUMMINGBIRDS AND FLOWERS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE HUMMINGBIRDS AND FLOWERS I AM GOING TO MAKE ME KING QUIT AS SOON AS I FIND MORE FABRIC
customer_reviews.author: annette H. Shook

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as I love hummingbirds. Unfortunately, the quality of the pages and the way they are printed are cheap. Almost as if the original coloring book was purchased and then multiple books were xerox copied.
customer_reviews.author: Amparo Magana

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful book
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the book is the hummingbirds! But I would add that this is more advanced coloring book and is not beginner level
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love Hummingbirds!
customer_reviews.text: The Hummingbird is my favorite bird and I will enjoy coloring these pages from Coloring Book Cafe. I really like all their books!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: If you like hummingbirds & coloring - You'll love this book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting my order would be nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems how this won’t get here why I have no idea but never had this problem and never will I’ll just STOP ordering anything from you again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hummers Rule In This Awesome Book!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that hummers come in many irridecent colors and it is tricky to try to color them that way but it was a challenge I enjoyed! There is so much to love about hummers and their colors are unbelivable! I loved the challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Clear Colouring Pages
customer_reviews.text: Each page in this book has been beautifully designed. It is easy to see what the images are, as there is not an overabundance of lines on the pages - the hummingbirds look like real birds and the scenery around them is also gorgeous. Definitely recommend that you purchase this book if you enjoy colouring birds and scenery.
customer_reviews.author: Shona

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lovely pictures of hummingbirds
customer_reviews.text: This is a thirty page coloring book filled with drawings of hummingbirds of all types. They’re in all types of settings, surrounded my numerous species of flowers and other outdoor things. I saw a birdhouse, watering can, a squirrel, grapes, sunflowers, pansies, and much more. If you love those tiny little birds, or are as fascinated by them as I am, this book is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ramaglia

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book and really love it so much. The line art is clear and easy to color, neither too thin, nor too thick. The images vary and there are both beautiful hummingbirds, plus other wildlife such as butterflies and a squirrel or two. There are exotic leaves and flowers as well as trees. It is a superb coloring book for anyone young or old who loves to color.
customer_reviews.author: E. WrightTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Coloring Book, couldn’t find another like it!
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of hummingbirds, and living in the north I get bummed seeing them migrate away through our cold winters, So, I loved seeing a realistic coloring book with just hummingbirds to color in through the winter season. The line work is great like the other coloring book cafe books I own, and the paper works well with alcohol markers (just make sure to always use a separator behind your page to prevent bleed onto the next) and colored pencils. Amazing variety of scenes too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are great
customer_reviews.text: I love these coloring books.... I try to get them digital when I can because besides my self, I have 3 grand kids who like to color.... so this way ... we can all color the same image.. and if a mistake is made.. I just print another. They print very sharp and clear on my HP Envoy printer
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: lovely detail
customer_reviews.text: Love the pics in this new colouring book. Hummingbirds and exotic plants are my favourites especially hibiscus. Received an Arc of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline King

customer_reviews.title: Clear, BEAUTIFUL images
customer_reviews.text: Such a fabulous book. I love Humming birds and this book has some of the most prettiest images. M.K
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coloring Book
customer_reviews.text: This book has lots of great pictures to color. I liked the variety & I appreciated that some were easier & some were more intricate. Very sweet birdies!
customer_reviews.author: quilt girl

customer_reviews.title: good book
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pictures! I will enjoy coloring all the projects in this book!
customer_reviews.author: toya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The images are lovely. The is a great deal of detail invest in each hummingbird and flowers. There is also painstaking detail in each hummingbirds background.
customer_reviews.author: Terri McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful relaxing humming birds to color!
customer_reviews.text: The book has beautiful pictures of humming birds flying in different poses. Amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful illustrations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The recipient is very pleased & is looking forward to bringing the beautiful illustrations to life by pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Book
customer_reviews.text: I love hummingbirds and the images in this book are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: MollyP

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pages. They have various different species too. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.
